name: Blind Guy
description:
This game is for the Wowie#4 Game jam
Theme:
Collaborate With AI
Description:
You are a dog and you have to safely guide your blind master across his environment. You must help him collect money and not get ran over by incoming traffic. You cannot go on the road but only the side and cross walk, because your a good boy :)
Controls:
Move-W,A,S,D
Bark (Moves Blind Master Towards You) - Left Mouse Click
Bark #2  (Moves Blind Master Away From You) - Right Mouse Click
Restart -R
Assets:
Art- Kenney Assets and  Open Game Art
Music - Free Sounds
Creators:
Chris and Clay
